Room.Name: Castle Arch
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing in a great hallway, under the massive arch of Castle Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: The corridor is a north-south connection between the castle's courtyard and the great gate at the drawbridge. Directly south is a busy intersection where the corridor seems to widen before leading to the courtyard. There is a cross corridor in that direction. As you look about you, you realize that each stone in the arch overhead must weigh at least six tons. What a marvel of construction is this castle.
